rules_text:
Exile up to one target creature you control. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Search your library for an Eiyo card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: [i]“I spent years thinking life transient, like a dream. But there's so much beauty in the temporary. In the bloom of a flower,” Eiyo affirmed. “I refuse to destroy that.”[/i]
